main event: A report of a sighting of an unidentified flying object described as being the size of a B-36 bomber, bright red in color, observed over San Francisco.
interesting points: The object was described as horizontal and oblong in shape,The object was reported to be traveling at an estimated speed of 1500 mph with no sound made during the sighting,Visibility during the observation was noted to be clear at 12 miles,The sighting had multiple visual observations including ground observations,The object traveled west-southwest over San Francisco.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object the size of a B-36 bomber
witness description: sighted by personnel at a post
